title: When open source is done right, the sky's the limit
author: techradar-pro
summary: A Q&A with Ian Tien, co-founder and CEO at Mattermost.
article: As a result of the pandemic, greater attention than ever is being paid to the tools and services that allow employees to work from any location.

Video conferencing and collaboration services such as Teams and Slack have snatched much of the spotlight, but there are alternatives on the market that approach the same kinds of problems in a different fashion.
Mattermost, for example, is an open source collaboration platform that prides itself on its transparent architecture and developer-centric design.
TechRadar Pro spoke to Ian Tien, co-founder and CEO, to hear more about the open core business model and how Mattermost differentiates itself in an increasingly competitive market.
